channel.title: My Personal News Briefing
channel.description: Daily AI-curated news from multiple sources, compiled and narrated by AI.
channel.itunes:author: News Pipeline

item.title: My Personal News Briefing — February 20, 2026
item.description: The US Supreme Court just dropped a bombshell, potentially forcing the government to refund over 175 billion dollars in duties, a move that could reshape global trade.

item.title: My Personal News Briefing — February 19, 2026
item.description: The United States is reportedly moving a significant military presence towards Iran, and there are whispers that President Trump might be considering strikes as early as this weekend.
